TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FromEmbedderHandler(object o, FromEmbedderArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed FromEmbedderHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the FromEmbedderHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the FromEmbedderHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the FromEmbedderHandler is removed from the event.
